name: boblogistics
title: Bob's Logistics mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod.

Adds lots logistic related things in all areas.
Adds 2 higher tiers of belt and related entities.
Belt overhaul will change all recipes to make better use of Bob mod resources, and add a Tier 0.
Adds a higher tier of inserters.
Inserter overhaul will add more tiers of inserter, replace long handed inserter with a menu to make other inserters long handed, and change all recipes to make better use of Bob mod resources.
If suitable materials are available, it will add 2 higher tiers of chest, and logistic chests
Adds 2 higher tiers of train set (Locomotive, Cargo wagon and Fluid wagon) that will have higher speed and storage. Also adds an armored train set, and Tier 2 version of it.
Adds tier 2 to 4 pumps, and reduces the flow to make the progression work
Adds tier 2 to 4 of Logistic and Construction robots.
Adds tier 2 to 4 roboports, roboport parts (intermediates), and smaller specialised entities, such as the Logistic Zone Expander and Robochest.
Adds tier 2 to 4 of storage tank.
Adds many new pipes made from many different materials, spanning 5 tiers.

Although it can function as a stand alone mod, it is intended to be used with the full Bob's Mods set.
